subject: Resources to make you a Udio pro

Hey there üëã

While you‚Äôre getting acquainted with Udio and its features, we wanted to share a few tips & tricks to help set you on the right track (pun intended).


** 5 Minute Tutorial
------------------------------------------------------------
https://youtu.be/6IlItfVfOkQ?utm_source=mailchimp&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=welcome&utm_content=welcome_email&utm_source=mailchimp&utm_campaign=welcome&utm_medium=email&mc_cid=2849a228e9&mc_eid=UNIQID


** Pro Tips
------------------------------------------------------------
* Get more control over your outputs by selecting 'Create' in the left hand menu of your homepage, then expanding the 'Advanced Controls' section.
* Try tapping on tags (at the bottom of your prompt window on the ‚ÄòCreate‚Äô page) to make your prompt more sophisticated. Add a comma between different parts of the prompt. E.g. ‚ÄúSynth pop, male vocals.‚Äù
* Vet your lyrics before generating songs by toggling into ‚ÄòWrite Lyrics‚Äô mode on the ‚ÄòCreate‚Äô page. You can generate sample lyrics and edit them, or can write lines of your own.
* In ‚ÄòWrite Lyrics‚Äô mode, type ‚Äú/‚Äú as a shortcut to access song structuring labels that you can use to organize to your song.
* Keep it fresh! To avoid hitting errors, make sure you‚Äôre suggesting something that‚Äôs a ‚Äòyou‚Äô original, rather than borrowed from an existing artist or their work.

Got it, let‚Äôs go! (https://udio.com/create?utm_source=mailchimp&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=welcome&utm_content=new_user_education&utm_source=mailchimp&utm_campaign=welcome&utm_medium=email&mc_cid=2849a228e9&mc_eid=UNIQID)
